oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Eugene Lockridge and son inspect rattlesnake, Nashville, Tennessee, 1958 July
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Pictured: “Two-year old James and his father Eugene Lockridge inspect the five-foot rattlesnake Lockridge killed Friday at Pegram Station ...” Nashville Banner, July 19th, 1958. Forms part of Nashville Banner Negatives Collection. 1 photographic negative : b & w ; 4 x 5 in.
